title: Divider: Color
code:
<gds-flex flex-direction="column" gap="xs" width="100%" padding="2xl">
  <gds-card variant="secondary" border-color="primary">
    <gds-flex flex-direction="column" gap="s">
      <gds-text>Primary</gds-text>
      <gds-divider color="primary"></gds-divider>
    </gds-flex>
  </gds-card>
  <gds-card variant="secondary" border-color="primary">
    <gds-flex flex-direction="column" gap="s">
      <gds-text>Secondary</gds-text>
      <gds-divider color="secondary"></gds-divider>
    </gds-flex>
  </gds-card>
  <gds-card variant="tertiary" border-color="primary">
    <gds-flex flex-direction="column" gap="s">
      <gds-text>Tertiary</gds-text>
      <gds-divider color="tertiary"></gds-divider>
    </gds-flex>
  </gds-card>
  <gds-card variant="secondary" border-color="primary">
    <gds-flex flex-direction="column" gap="s">
      <gds-text>Negative</gds-text>
      <gds-divider color="negative"></gds-divider>
    </gds-flex>
  </gds-card>
</gds-flex>
